title: The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000142)
body: So my league client worked for a while and I played some games and stopped for a few days.I believe the new patch was live when this happened.It esentially crashes after champ select and gives me the error shown in the title.I've tried a lot of things but I just can't seem to make it work.

replies.body: This crashing or bugsplat after champion select usually occurs when the game has failed to render.  This message suggests there may be a driver or hardware problem that can't load the game properly.  I suggest using the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to work towards a solution.  Hope that helps!
